long_description: The Victorinox Travel Sentry cable lock allows security screeners to unlock and relock the device without destroying it during baggage checks. Durable cast zinc construction with flexible cable makes threading lock easy. Rubber enhancements provide a soft grip. Sized to fit through locking zipper sliders on luggage and briefcases. 3-digit combination can be reset as needed.
short_description: The Victorinox Travel Sentry cable lock allows security screeners to unlock and relock the device without destroying it during baggage checks.
